Quick Summary text-base → normal font-size space-x-* → horizontal gap between children space-y-* → vertical gap between children shadow-lg / shadow-xl → box shadows (depth) items-center → align vertically (cross axis) justify-center → align horizontally (main axis) flex → Flexbox layout grid → Grid layout place-content-center → Grid ke andar full center (X + Y)
